alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Greene; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 1:44AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Greene, Craighead and northeastern Poinsett Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 144 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Egypt to near Bay to near Lepanto. Movement was north at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Paragould, Trumann, Bono, Lake City, Lepanto, Bay, Brookland, Monette, Caraway, Crowleys Ridge State Park, Lake Frierson State Park, Oak Grove Heights, Cash, O`Kean, Delaplaine, Egypt, Evening Star, Beech Grove and Walcott. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
